lead_paragraph: Jeff Teague scored 19 points, Al Horford added 18 and the Atlanta Hawks snapped a three-game losing streak with a 103-88 victory over the short-handed Chicago Bulls on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Teague, Horford Help Push Hawks Past Depleted Bulls 103-88
headline.main: Teague, Horford Help Push Hawks Past Depleted Bulls 103-88

snippet: Jeff Teague scored 19 points, Al Horford added 18 and the Atlanta Hawks snapped a three-game losing streak with a 103-88 victory over the short-handed Chicago Bulls on Friday night....
